operations with trend collections
[trend function (trend)]


Functions

bool surfit::trends_delall ()
 removes all trend's from surfit_trends
bool surfit::trends_del (int pos)
 removes trend from surfit_trends at "pos" position
bool surfit::trends_load (const char *filename, const char *trendname=0)
 loads trend from ROFF file (see datafile for details) and adds it to surfit_trends
bool surfit::trends_load_grd (const char *filename, REAL D1, REAL D2, const char *trendname=NULL)
 loads trend from SURFER grd file (ASCII format) and adds it to surfit_trends
bool surfit::trends_unload (const char *name)
 removes first trend from surfit_trends named with "name"
trend * surfit::trends_at (int pos)
 returns trend at "pos" position from surfit_trends
trend * surfit::trends_first ()
 returns first trend from surfit_trends
trend * surfit::trends_last ()
 returns last trend from surfit_trends
int surfit::trends_size ()
 returns amount of trendtions in surfit_trends
int surfit::trends_info ()
 prints information about trendtions in surfit_trends
